item.title: “Daughter of Evil” Musical Teaser & More!
item.dc:creator: Cowfee
item.description:
The “Daughter of Evil” musical production is already halfway through their showings, with the final one happening on Sunday, June 11th. Unfortunately, unless you are in Japan right now, there is probably little chance for you to catch the rest of these performances in time. However, you may be happy to hear that an official …

The post “Daughter of Evil” Musical Teaser & More! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The “Daughter of Evil” musical production is already halfway through their showings, with the final one happening on Sunday, June 11th. Unfortunately, unless you are in Japan right now, there is probably little chance for you to catch the rest of these performances in time.

However, you may be happy to hear that an official practice scene was uploaded on YouTube by the production and promotion company in charge, Amipro, right before the first showing occurred! Have a watch below!

Well, what did you think? Was it anything you expected, or something completely different? Either way, being able to catch even a glimpse into this aspect of the musical production behind the scenes is quite the treat — “Let them eat cake!”

In addition to the teaser video, the rest of the cast information was released, as well as other details and announcements.

Full Cast

On the official website, we finally have the full cast! Here are the rest of the members that were not already revealed in our previous article.

  • Satoshi Takeno
  • Daiki Hasegawa
  • Sena Osaki
  • Shinichiro Kuroki
  • Hiroshi Niki
  • Koki Sagara
  • Rio Ma
  • Toko Nakayama
  • Miwa Ichise
  • Miku Hayano
  • Moe Nakamura
  • Sanae Kadota
  • Yoshino Motoyama

Open Panel Sessions

After each weekday performance, Kenta Kida will host open panel talk sessions with the actual casting interacting with the audience! While the nature of the talk shows themselves are not known, we can assume that they will be discussing the performance in general and answering any questions.

Schedule

Note: The scheduled times are NOT when the talk shows will occur. These are the times of the performances themselves.

Moderator: Kenta Kida

  • Monday, June 5th: 19:00
    Reina Tanaka, Kazutomi Yamamoto, Kenta Kamakari, & Naoki Nokubo
  • Tuesday, June 6th: 14:00 and 19:00
    Reina Tanaka, Kenta Kamakari, Goro Takeishi, & Kiyoshi Ono
  • Tuesday, June 6th: 19:00
    Reina Tanaka, Yui Takano, Yukari Nakamura, & Aika Ota
  • Wednesday, June 7th: 19:00
    Reina Tanaka, Kazutomi Yamamoto, Fumina Suzuki, & Naoki Nokubo
  • Thursday, June 8th: 19:00
    Reina Tanaka, Kazutomi Yamamoto, Aika Ota, & Kenta Kamakari
  • Friday, June 9th: 19:00
    Reina Tanaka, Kazutomi Yamamoto, Jun Takada, & Naoki Nokubo

Interview

Last but not least, there was a two-part interview uploaded on YouTube by the Japanese entertainment news company, MAiDiGiTV. The interview focuses on the main cast, specifically Reina Tanaka (Riliane Lucifen d’Autriche / Rin), about their personal thoughts and feelings when acting as their characters but eventually getting used to their roles. While there is no English translation currently available, feel free to check it out!

Bonus Pictures

Even though getting to know more about the wonderfully talented cast members as themselves is exciting, there’s still a marginal difference when it comes to the stage. If you’re still itching for more content about the musical in all its theatrical glory, there’s a whole gallery provided within an article on the Japanese entertainment news website, Natalie. Decked out with nearly 30 splendid shots of the actors and actresses in action, it’s definitely something you don’t want to miss!

“Daughter of Evil” Musical Performance Photo Gallery:
http://natalie.mu/stage/gallery/show/news_id/235385/image_id/786687

And if you have a penchant for the flashy, extravagant suits and dresses that the cast don, there’s another gallery for you to have a closer look as well, thanks to MANTANWEB.

“Daughter of Evil” Musical Outfits Photo Gallery:
https://mantan-web.jp/gallery/2017/06/03/20170603dog00m200033000c/002.html

For More Information

If you are interested in learning more about the musical adaption, check out our previous article announcement and the musical’s official website below.

Daughter of Evil Musical Announced for June!
“Daughter of Evil” Musical Website 

The post “Daughter of Evil” Musical Teaser & More! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Daughter of Evil Musical Announced for June!
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
Fans of the “Story of Evil” series will be happy to hear that there will be a “Daughter of Evil” musical! At the moment, it’s unknown how far into the Evil series plot this musical will go. However, it will definitely be a must-see for fans! About the Musical The Aku no Musume Musical was announced …

The post Daughter of Evil Musical Announced for June! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Fans of the “Story of Evil” series will be happy to hear that there will be a “Daughter of Evil” musical! At the moment, it’s unknown how far into the Evil series plot this musical will go. However, it will definitely be a must-see for fans!

About the Musical

The Aku no Musume Musical was announced for June 4th-11th, 2017. Hidekatsu Tokunaga will be the director and do the screenplay. It will be performed at Owl Spot Theater, East Ikebukuro in Tokyo.

Main Cast

Riliane Lucifen d’Autriche (Rin): Reina Tanaka, ex-“Morning Musume” and currently vocalist of Girls Band “LoVendoЯ”
Allen Avadonia (Len): Kazutomi Yamamoto.

Other Mentioned Cast
  • Yui Takano, ex-member of NMB48
  • Aika Ota, member of HKT48
  • Kenta Kamakari, known for his appearances in the “Prince of Tennis” Musicals
  • Suzuki Fumina
  • Naoki Nokubo

Show Times

As mentioned earlier, the shows are on June 4th to the 11th. In total, there are 12 shows. (All times are in JST.)

  • Sunday, June 4th: 13:00 and 18:00
  • Monday, June 5th: 19:00
  • Tuesday, June 6th: 14:00 and 19:00
  • Wednesday, June 7th: 19:00
  • Thursday, June 8th: 19:00
  • Friday, June 9th: 19:00
  • Saturday, June 10th: 13:00 and 18:00
  • Sunday, June 11th: 12:00 and 16:00

Tickets

There are three ways to get tickets. In addition to the two pre-sale lotteries, there will be general ticket sales as well.

Pre-sale tickets cost ¥8,000 JPY while tickets on the day of the musical are ¥8,500 JPY.

Play Guide Fastest Advance Sales (Lottery): March 7th – March 13th
Play Guide · FC Preceding Sales (Lottery): March 25 – April 2
General Sales: April 16th, 10:00

Websites

■ CN Play Guide
Internet Reservation: http://www.cnplayguide.com/amitike/

■ Confetti (Camperfeti)
Internet Reservation: http://confetti-web.com/akunomusume/

■ Rakuten Play Guide
Internet Reservation: http://r-t.jp/amipro

Please note that all websites are in Japanese. In addition, CN Play Guide and Confetti both offer phone orders as well. You can find information about phone orders on the official website.

Returning Viewer Bonuses

If you view the musical more than one time, you’ll receive special bonuses depending on how many times you go!

  • 3 Visits: An exclusive L-sized bromide portrait unavailable for purchase (version A)
  • 6 Visits: An exclusive L-sized bromide portrait unavailable for purchase (version B)
  • 10 Visits: An A4-sized bromide portrait autographed by your favorite cast member

Note: Bromides are small, postcard-like items that feature illustrations of photographs.

If you’ll be in Tokyo during the time of the musical, be sure to go! It’s bound to be a treat.

The post Daughter of Evil Musical Announced for June! appeared first on VNN.
